hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and triamterene can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  triamterene  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and trimethoprim can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and trimethoprim can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and trimethoprim can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and trimipramine can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  trimipramine  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Urokinase causes bleeding, as can sulindac ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Urokinase   causes   bleeding, as can   sulindac   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and valaciclovir can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  valaciclovir  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and valganciclovir can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  valganciclovir  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and valsartan can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  valsartan  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and vancomycin can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  vancomycin  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and venlafaxine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  venlafaxine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Sulindac causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Sulindac   causes   bleeding, as can   volanesorsen   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and vortioxetine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  vortioxetine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Warfarin causes bleeding, as can sulindac ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Warfarin   causes   bleeding, as can   sulindac   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and xipamide can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  xipamide  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Sulindac increases the risk of acute renal failure when given with xipamide. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Sulindac   increases   the risk of acute renal failure when given with   xipamide .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and zidovudine can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Zidovudine increases the risk of haematological toxicity when given with sulindac. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Zidovudine   increases   the risk of haematological toxicity when given with   sulindac .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sulindac and zoledronate can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  sulindac  and  zoledronate  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.
